bio: Whisper has had a spooky makeover for Halloween! His scythe is made of rubber, though… He can’t even cut vegetables.

soultimate.name: Unhappy J Sickle
soultimate.description: Deal massive damage to foes nearby.

skill.effect: 10% more likely to cause criticals for all allies.
skill.name: Worldy Whisdom

name: Halloween Josper
